title: Obey those in authority, even our boss when we know a more BETTER way of doing the work?
transcript:
[Questioner] from India we have been commanded 
to obey those in Authority if a manager is an   authority in an I.T company then obviously we have

than manager they automate tasks and get the job   done which irritates the manager he wants it
